title: 民主图片挑战赛：2010年获奖者
content:
原始来源：http://www.democracyphotochallenge.america.gov/winners2010.html
翻译：wmr

Kaylene George, South Africa

“Democracy is…in our hands.”
“民主是…在我们手中。”

Mike Mitchell, Benin

“Democracy is… the right to education, the freedom to learn and the hope of a future.”
“民主是…受教育的权利，自由学习和未来的希望。”

Mikas Aleya C. Matsuzawa, Philippines

“Democracy is… accessible and quality education for all. It is education as a right.”
“民主是…所有人可受教育、平等受教育。视教育为权利。”

Venkatesh Hamyanaik, Australia

“Democracy is… freedom without boundaries!”
“民主是…自由无界限！”

Dino Peric, Bosnia and Herzegovina

“Democracy is… to have a dream about better future.”
“民主是…有一个对更好未来的梦想。”

Mehman Huseynov, Azerbaijan

“Democracy is…when we Have Press Freedom!!!”
“民主是…当我们有出版自由。”

Kaveh Baghdadchi, Iran

“Democracy is the state of being free to act and look different from the way others do.”
“民主是自由与他人有不同的行动和样子的国家。”

Mohamed Kaouche, Algeria

“Democracy is…to live in freedom.”
“民主是…生活在自由中。”

Jun Krishna Joshi, Nepal

“Democracy is…still learning.”
“民主是…仍在学习。”

Mustafa Kia, Afghanistan

“Democracy is voting for who you want as your president.”
“民主是选举你想要的总统。”

Ian M. Cunningham, United States

“Democracy is… many and it is one. It is large and it is small. It is standing under harsh, beating sun and joining together to make shelter. Taken during a protest in front of the White House during the Iranian election crisis in June 2009.”
“民主是…很多，这是一点。它大它小。它之下是苛刻、公开和一同参与使它受到保护。在2009年6月伊朗大选的紧急关头在白宫前抗议。”

Wládia Drummond, Brazil

“Democracy is…to decide together.”
“民主是…共同决策。”
